title: Inn of the Seventh Ray
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, Lacto, Ovo, American, International, Gourmet, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. Rustic canyon setting. Offers daily lunch and dinner a la carte menu that includes some vegetarian options in soup, salads, main entrees. Vegan desserts available. A large brunch spread is offered on Sunday, and it includes many vegetarian and some vegan dishes, plus an assortment of desserts. Reservation recommended on weekend.
